tutorial.speak:
From the Dashboard, click on Sermons in the left sidebar to access your sermon library.
On the Sermons page, click the Add Sermon button in the top right corner and select Add Sermon from the dropdown.
Select a Playlist for your sermon, choose YouTube as the video provider, then enter the YouTube video I.D. and click Fetch. The video I.D. is the string of characters after "v=" in the YouTube URL.
We recommend YouTube for your video library because it seems to work best with our system. However, we also support Vimeo, Facebook, or your own Custom URL.
When you click Fetch, all of the video details will be imported automatically. This includes the publish date, duration, title, description, and thumbnail. Make any changes you wish and click Save.
The sermon will now appear in your sermons list, organized by playlist.
To schedule this sermon for a live stream, go to Lyve Stream Times. Under Video Settings, you can select your sermon from the dropdown to broadcast it as a pre-recorded stream.
